title: Multiplex Garcinia Review
author: Andrew (Editor)

organizations.name: multiplex garcinia review diet reviews / garcinia cambogia / multiplex garcinia review

text:
Diet Reviews / Garcinia Cambogia / Multiplex Garcinia Review 
Why are people talking about Multiplex Garcinia and the benefits of hydroxycitric acid? We’ll find out by taking a deep dive into the ingredients, side effects, and clinical research. We also read many dieter experiences to get their side of the issue. Finally, we condensed all this information to give you the details you want to know. Multiplex Garcinia Readers:   Leptigen. What is Multiplex Garcinia? 
First off, Multiplex Garcinia is a natural supplement that aims at improving weight-loss results. We are not sure about the ingredients, although we believe it contains hydroxycitric acid. There’s not a lot of information on how to take the supplement, but it seems the ingredient list is quite short, which we like to see. 
The only information we could find surrounding Multiplex Garcinia was that their website was created in 2016, which is the only place you can buy the product. We like that Garcinia cambogia has been researched and that it has many claims of health benefits but read on… Is Multiplex a complex alternative to other garcinia supplements? Free Trial Offer – “How Much Does It Cost?” 
The first issue we found with Multiplex Garcinia was their free trial offer. “Unfortunately, a lot of scam supplements use free trial offers to get money out of individuals,” said our Research Editor. “If this is the case with Multiplex Garcinia, there could be a real problem.” 
“Don’t pay for this trial, five days later you get billed for $95, and they don’t answer the calls,” said a user. 
“Paid for the trial offer and in less than 14 days…charged over 200.00…,” commented another. 
We could not find any reviews about the trial offer that were not negative. Scroll   Billing Issues – “How Much Do You Pay for Multiplex Garcinia?” 
The second problem we found with Multiplex Garcinia was their billing. Multiple reviews reported charges, but never receiving the product. 
“They attached a green coffee trial to my order and billed me $93.63 for each two weeks later,” one customer said. 
Another had a similar experience, saying, “Terrible experience…I’m out over $200 because they snuck the green tea product in.” 
Unfortunately, we could not find any positive comments concerning their billing, but there could be some out there. 
After years of researching diet products, we found it can take something that seems irrelevant to slash the chance of measurable results. If Multiplex Garcinia has issues with their free trial offer and billing, that could be a major problem. The Science – “What Does the Research Say?” 
There’s research into Garcinia cambogia, the main component in Multiplex Garcinia. However, very few of the studies point to its weight-loss abilities. Additionally, the supplement does not cite any resources to back up their claims. Before we recommend any product, we like to see a significant amount of science, which does not seem to be present here.   Multiplex Garcinia Work? 
Are we racing out to buy some Multiplex Garcinia? Well, we like that this supplement has a small ingredient list and that Garcinia cambogia has been researched. However, we have some reservations because of their free trial offer and billing issues. 
If you want to lose weight, we suggest using a product that does not try to bill you for something you did not buy. 
  we’ve seen this year is Leptigen . Its formula includes a proprietary blend of four clinically researched ingredients have been shown to help spark fat burn and reduce appetite. Comments around the web indicate that people see great results. 
Additionally, the company is offering a Special Trial Offer for all new customers, which seems like a great deal to us. Get Your Sample Today   Is Multiplex a complex alternative to other garcinia supplements?
